mapper.select: select id as "id", encrypt_password as "encryptPassword", name as "name", email as "email", authority as "authority", created_date as "createdDate", updated_date as "updatedDate" from sample_users where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sample_users (id, encrypt_password, name, email, authority, created_date, updated_date) values (#{id}, #{encryptPassword}, #{name}, #{email}, #{authority}, now(), now())
